$schema.title: JSON Schema
$schema.description: Reference to JSON schema of this config

db_url.description: DB connection URL. Defaults to postgresql:///?service=qwc_configdb.

qwc_config_schema.description: The name of the DB schema which stores the qwc config. Default: qwc_config

user_permalink_table.description: User permalink table. Defaults to qwc_config.user_permalinks.

user_bookmark_table.description: User bookmarks table. Defaults to qwc_config.user_bookmarks.

user_visibility_presets_table.description: User visibility presets table. Defaults to qwc_config.user_visibility_presets.

bookmarks_sort_order.description: Bookmarks sort order, defaults to "date DESC, description".

default_expiry_period.description: Default expiry period for permalinks, in days. Default: null (no expiry)

store_bookmarks_by_userid.description: Whether to store bookmarks by userid instead of username. Default: true
